summary: A look at the movies in the year 1939, considered by many to be one of the greatest years in film history.
cast: Kenneth Branagh|Leonard Maltin|Thomas G. Schatz|F.X. Feeney|Scott Eyman|Jeanine Basinger|Aubrey Solomon|Molly Haskell|George Cukor|Rudy Behlmer|Francis Lederer|A.C. Lyles|Joseph McBride|Frank Capra|Howard Hawks|Richard B. Jewell|Douglas Fairbanks Jr.|Maureen O'Hara|Claire Trevor|Daniel Selznick|Ann Rutherford|Fred Astaire|Humphrey Bogart|Charles Boyer|James Cagney|Joan Crawford|Bette Davis|Olivia de Havilland|Walt Disney|Robert Donat|Irene Dunne|Errol Flynn|John Ford|Clark Gable|Greta Garbo|Judy Garland|Greer Garson|Cary Grant|Bob Hope|Charles Laughton|Vivien Leigh|Myrna Loy|Louis B. Mayer|Hattie McDaniel|Thomas Mitchell|Edward G. Robinson|Ginger Rogers|Mickey Rooney|Franklin D. Roosevelt|David O. Selznick|George Stevens|James Stewart|Spencer Tracy|Lana Turner|Jack L. Warner|John Wayne|Darryl F. Zanuck
title: 1939: Hollywood's Greatest Year
